unnormalised: ## New Wheels on the Road: What's Hot in the Indian Auto Scene!
normalised: ## New Wheels on the Road: What's Hot in the Indian Auto Scene!

unnormalised: Namaste auto enthusiasts! Let's talk about the latest shiny metal rolling out of showrooms, shall we? The automotive scene in India is buzzing, with manufacturers dropping new vehicles left, right, and centre. It's more exciting than the climax of a Rohit Shetty film, trust me!
normalised: Namaste auto enthusiasts! Let's talk about the latest shiny metal rolling out of showrooms, shall we? The automotive scene in India is buzzing, with manufacturers dropping new vehicles left, right, and centre. It's more exciting than the climax of a Rohit Shetty film, trust me!

unnormalised: First up, we've got whispers about a new compact SUV from Maruti Suzuki, rumoured to be a game changer in the sub-4 meter category. They're supposedly testing it extensively around Manali, so keep your eyes peeled if you're up in the hills. Early estimates suggest it'll be priced competitively, around Rs. 8 Lakhs onwards.
normalised: First up, we've got whispers about a new compact S U V from Maruti Suzuki, rumoured to be a game changer in the sub-four meter category. They're supposedly testing it extensively around Manali, so keep your eyes peeled if you're up in the hills. Early estimates suggest it'll be priced competitively, around rupee eight lakh onwards.

unnormalised: Then there's Tata Motors, riding high on the success of the Nexon and Harrier, reportedly working on an electric version of the Punch. Could this be the answer to pollution woes in cities like Delhi and Mumbai? Imagine cruising silently past Juhu beach in your electric Punch!
normalised: Then there's Tata Motors, riding high on the success of the Nexon and Harrier, reportedly working on an electric version of the Punch. Could this be the answer to pollution woes in cities like Delhi and Mumbai? Imagine cruising silently past Juhu beach in your electric Punch!

unnormalised: Not to be left behind, Mahindra is prepping for a major launch, possibly a refreshed Thar with improved comfort and features. Remember the waiting lists for the current model? Expect the same frenzy this time around!
normalised: Not to be left behind, Mahindra is prepping for a major launch, possibly a refreshed Thar with improved comfort and features. Remember the waiting lists for the current model? Expect the same frenzy this time around!

unnormalised: Speaking of innovation, our own IIT Madras is apparently contributing expertise to several EV startups. It's fantastic to see indigenous talent shaping the future of mobility!
normalised: Speaking of innovation, our own I I T Madras is apparently contributing expertise to several E V startups. It's fantastic to see indigenous talent shaping the future of mobility!

unnormalised: Don't forget the luxury segment. BMW and Mercedes are bringing in their latest models with all the bells and whistles. Think panoramic sunroofs, advanced driver assistance systems, and enough horsepower to make your chai spill.
normalised: Don't forget the luxury segment. B M W and Mercedes are bringing in their latest models with all the bells and whistles. Think panoramic sunroofs, advanced driver assistance systems, and enough horsepower to make your chai spill.

unnormalised: So, there you have it! A quick rundown of the vehicle launches to watch out for. Stay tuned for more updates, and happy driving (safely, of course!) Remember, drive responsibly and always wear your seatbelt. Jai Hind!
normalised: So, there you have it! A quick rundown of the vehicle launches to watch out for. Stay tuned for more updates, and happy driving (safely, of course!) Remember, drive responsibly and always wear your seatbelt. Jai Hind!
